items.name: Loreweave
explicitMods: Has 6 Sockets
+13 to all Attributes
Adds 8 to 15 Physical Damage to Attacks
34% increased Global Critical Strike Chance
+21 to maximum Energy Shield
+37 to maximum Life
+48 to maximum Mana
15% increased Rarity of Items found
30% increased Elemental Damage
Your Maximum Resistances are 76%
flavourText: When it comes to finding a use for surplus,
a rich man has within himself
boundless creativity.

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.secDescrText: Teleport to a location, damaging enemies and leaving a trail of burning ground in your wake. Shares a cooldown with other Blink skills.
explicitMods: Deals 1738.6 Base Fire Damage per second
Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Deals 659 to 988 Fire Damage
29% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: +0.1 metres to radius
You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby allies have 21% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 10% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that adds fire damage to the attacks and spells of you and your allies.
explicitMods: +0.1 metres to radius
You and nearby allies deal 19 to 27 additional Fire Damage with Attacks
You and nearby allies deal 19 to 27 additional Fire Damage with Spells
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Hyrri's Truth
explicitMods: Grants Level 30 Precision Skill
+71 to Dexterity
+28% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier
Bow Attacks have Culling Strike
Precision has 100% increased Mana Reservation Efficiency
flavourText: Strike true, strike hard, and leave no survivors to retaliate.

items.name: Golem Twirl
explicitMods: +37 to Dexterity
Adds 5 to 12 Physical Damage to Attacks
34% increased Global Accuracy Rating
+22 to maximum Energy Shield
10% increased Light Radius

items.name: The Stampede
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
explicitMods: 132% increased Evasion and Energy Shield
32% increased Stun and Block Recovery
62% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills
31% increased Mana Regeneration Rate while moving
Your Movement Speed is 150% of its base value
flavourText: Relentlessness. Nothing more, nothing less.
<default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Lightning Golem that grants you increased Attack and Cast speed. The Lightning Golem fires a projectile spell, creates orbs of Lightning that zap nearby enemies, and casts a temporary aura that grants added Lightning Damage to spells and attacks used by the Golem and its nearby allies.
explicitMods: Maximum 1 Summoned Golem
Golems grant 6% increased Attack and Cast Speed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
12% increased Attack Speed
+53 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the armour and evasion of nearby allies, and reduces the critical strike chance of nearby enemies. Gains stages over time while carrying the banner near enemies. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
explicitMods: You and nearby Allies have 24% increased Armour and Evasion Rating
Nearby Enemies have 39% reduced Critical Strike Chance
Gain 1 Stage every 0.2 seconds while an Enemy is Nearby

Taunt nearby Enemies for 0.15 seconds per Stage on Placing the Banner
Enemies Taunted this way deal 15% less Damage
Base Duration of 10.00 seconds after being Placed
+1 second to Base Placed Banner Duration per Stage
When placed, 8% increased Area of Effect per Stage
When placed, 1% increased Aura effect per Stage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Atziri's Rule
implicitMods: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff
explicitMods: Grants Level 20 Queen's Demand Skill
Queen's Demand can Trigger Level 20 Flames of Judgement
Queen's Demand can Trigger Level 20 Storm of Judgement
Cannot be Stunned
Damage cannot be Reflected
flavourText: Bow before her... or suffer the most gruelling death imaginable.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills, or spell skills that deal damage.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 80% less Critical Strike Chance
Supported Skills deal 25% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies, making those hits penetrate enemy fire resistance.
explicitMods: Supported Skills Penetrate 20% Fire Resistance
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 11% more Fire Damage

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: 24% reduced maximum Life
Regenerate 219.9 Life per second

flavourText: An eye for an eye makes the whole world dead.

explicitMods: 34% increased Duration
14% increased Movement Speed during Effect

items.name: Death's Harp
explicitMods: 93% increased Physical Damage
10% increased Attack Speed
+50% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier
Bow Attacks fire 2 additional Arrows
flavourText: The mournful music of the strings,
The creaking arch, the arrow sings.
A choking cry, a rattled breath,
The Reaper's Song, the Harp of Death.

items.name: Lochtonial Caress
explicitMods: 12% increased Attack Speed
12% increased Cast Speed
13% reduced maximum Mana
14% chance to gain a Power, Frenzy or Endurance Charge on Kill
Conduit
flavourText: Why cling to your sanity? It offers you nothing.
Surrender to me, and I will grant you everything.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).
explicitMods: Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Base Burning Damage is 25% of Overkill Damage
2% more Burning Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 9% more Spell Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Ascent From Flesh
explicitMods: +300 to Evasion Rating
+80 to maximum Energy Shield
+15% to all Elemental Resistances
You have Phasing if Energy Shield Recharge has started Recently
30% increased Evasion Rating while Phasing
10% increased Movement Speed while Phasing
flavourText: A single step forward
Snap free from the prison
Reborn into freedom eternal
